heading: HJR0016
0: JOINT RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE USE OF THE RICE SUBSIDY AS PROVIDED UNDER THE PANTAWID PAMILYANG PILIPINO PROGRAM (4Ps) IN THE GENERAL APPROPRIATIONS ACT (GAA) FOR THE PURCHASE OF PALAY FROM FARMERS, MANDATING FOR THE PURPOSE THE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT (DSWD) TO BUY PALAY FROM THE LOCAL FARMERS AND DISTRIBUTE RICE SUBSIDY IN THE FORM OF ACTUAL RICE INSTEAD OF CASH ASSISTANCE TO QUALIFIED BENEFICIARIES
mother-bill statusstatus: House requested for a conference committee on 2019-11-12 Substituted by HJR0022
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HJR0016
FULL TITLE : JOINT RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE USE OF THE RICE SUBSIDY AS PROVIDED UNDER THE PANTAWID PAMILYANG PILIPINO PROGRAM (4Ps) IN THE GENERAL APPROPRIATIONS ACT (GAA) FOR THE PURCHASE OF PALAY FROM FARMERS, MANDATING FOR THE PURPOSE THE DEPARTMENT OF SOCIAL WELFARE AND DEVELOPMENT (DSWD) TO BUY PALAY FROM THE LOCAL FARMERS AND DISTRIBUTE RICE SUBSIDY IN THE FORM OF ACTUAL RICE INSTEAD OF CASH ASSISTANCE TO QUALIFIED BENEFICIARIES
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : VILLAFUERTE, LUIS RAYMUND "LRAY" JR F.
DATE FILED : 2019-09-13
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Chatto (000 2019-11-19)
COUNTERPART HOUSE BILL/CONCURRENT RESOLUTION: SJR0008
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-10-01
          -The Committee suspended deliberation on HBs 16 and 322 and directed the Secretariat to invite concerned government agencies to attend on the next committee hearing.
      2. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2019-10-23
          -The proposed substitute house joint resolution was approved and the Secretariat was directed to prepare the Committee Report of the same.
      3. Committee Report filed on 2019-11-04
MOTHER BILL: HJR0022
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE AND FOOD ON 2019-10-01
PREVIOUS COMMITTEE REFERRALS :PRIMARILY REFERRED TO APPROPRIATIONS on 2019-09-17;
